name: FFSystems
author: FFSystems

sections.description:
With this plugin you can add your FFSystems widget to your WordPress site.

This plugin adds the FFSystems service to your website. It uses an external service to process takeaway/delivery orders and/or restaurant reservations. This is done by including a JavaScript-snippet to your website via our Content Delivery Network (via the domain *.ffsystems.nl) or your custom domain. You will need an active account on FFSystems to use this plugin.

FFSystems has different products that could be used with this plugin. The available services (if they are activated for your team) are:
– FFAfhalen for takeaway/delivery
– FFReserveren for restaurant reservations

For more information about which data FFSystems is processing, you can take a look at this Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.
sections.installation:
1.
A: In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for FFSystems and click “Install now”
B: Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of ffsystems.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/.
3. Activate the plugin
sections.changelog:
v1.0.1 – June 01, 2021

Add extra description about the product to the readme.

1.0.0 – June 01, 2021

First release of the FFSystems for WordPress plugin.

short_description: An easy way to implement the FFSystems widget to your Wordpress sites.
